info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Avery County through 330 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newland, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newland, Banner Elk, Elk Park, Beech Mountain In Avery County, Sugar Mountain, Minneapolis, Pineola and Linville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
